title: Oh Yes We DID!!! 1 Bed/1 Bath for $1369! Call for details!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 700 Sq.
The Modern staff is dedicated to providing first class service to each and every resident.
Our dedicated on-site team focuses on resident programs and services that matter to you from volunteering to organizing fun and lively events.
Fostering a sense of community is at our core.
Even more, our 24/7 maintenance team is ready and available to take care of all your service needs.
We’re confident we will make you feel right at home within our Bear Creek community.

Tile Backsplashes, Ceiling Fan, Newly Renovated Units, Spacious Walk in Closets, Additional Outdoor Storage Closets, New shaker style cabinetry with chrome hardware, Dishwasher, Garbage Disposal, Gourmet Designer Kitchens, New Kitchen and Bath Countertops, Private Patio or Balcony with Views, Individual Climate Control, Wheelchair Access, Stainless Steel Appliance Package, Vaulted Ceilings with Skylights (top floor units), Cable & Internet Ready

Newly Redesigned Courtyard and Grill Area, Pet Friendly, Immediate Access to Bear Creek Walking and Bike Trails, Online Payments Available, Individual Detached Garages, Public Transportation, Children's playground with all new equipment, 24/7 Fitness Center, Resort Style Swimming Pool, 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Night Patrol, Brand New Laundry Facilities in Every Building, Upgraded Business Center with Computers and Free Wi-Fi, Lush Landscaping with Zen Pond, Carports, Package Receiving, Disability Access, Fenced in Dog Park, Modern Club House featuring TV Lounge and Gorgeous Community Kitchen
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.
